towns.name: Penang
towns.description: Penang is a Malaysian state located on the northwest coast of Penisular Malaysia, by the Malacca Strait.

towns.name: Terengganu
towns.description: Terengganu, or formerly known as Trengganu or Tringganu, is a sultanate and constitive state of federal Malaysia.

towns.name: Sabah
towns.description: Sabah is a state of Malaysia located on the northern portion of Borneo, which is in the region of East Malaysia.

towns.name: Perak
towns.description: Perak is a state of Malaysia on the west coast of Malay Peninsula.

towns.name: Melaka
towns.description: Melaka or Malacca, is a state of Malaysia which located in the southern region of the Malay Peninsula, next to the Strait of Malacca.

towns.name: Kuala Lumpur
towns.description: Kuala Lumpur, officially the Federal Territory of Kula Lumpur, is a federal territory, and the ceremonial, legislative and judicial capital city of Malaysia.
